class.name: spark_max_state_controller/SparkMaxStateController
class.description: The spark max state controller is publishes the current spark max state as a spark_max_state_msgs/SparkMaxState message. The spark_max state controller expects a SparkMaxStateInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: spark_max_config_controller/SparkMaxConfigController
class.description: The spark max config controller is publishes the current spark max config as a spark_max_state_msgs/SparkMaxConfig message. The spark_max config controller expects a SparkMaxStateInterface type of hardware interface.
